alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 2:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Leon County through 330 PM EDT... At 241 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northeast of Florida State University to 6 miles east of Tallahassee. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Moccasin Gap, Killearn Estates, Baum, Bradfordville, Killearn Lakes and Pisgah Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
